pages.text: Pandora is a chaotic entity summoned from Pandora’s Box. She is unpredictable and dangerous.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text:
- Summons minions 
- Reality Warp: Teleports randomly 
- Pandora’s Gamble: Random curses/buffs 
- Seal of the Box: Becomes invulnerable when damaged too fast.
